question: You are going to another country to study. You would like to do a part-time job while your are studying, so you want to ask a friend who lives there for some help. Write a letter to this fiend. In your letter: -give details of your study plans -explain why you want to get a part-time job -suggest how your friend could help you find a job
text: I hope this letter finds you well. I want to share some big news with you that I am coming to your country to pursue my diploma.

As the first semester might be conducted by online mode due to the pandemic of Covid-19 disease. Classes will be from Monday to Thursday in the evening batch. However, there will be no work for me to do in the mornings. So, I wish to do a job on a part-time basis to utilize my free time.
In addition, a temporary job will help me to earn some money through which I can pay for the basic necessities. It will make me independent and I don't need to ask for funds from my parents.

This place is new for me and you're here for more than 4 years. So, I need your help to suggest me a suitable job as per my requirements. You can ask your current employer or your previous one if there is any vacant position for any post. Although  I'm interested to do accounting tasks yet I can manage to accomplish any other task.
I hope you'll guide me on this to get a work. I can't wait to see you and enjoy your company.
